column1: NGR is from the 1950s record sheet and applies from 1921. Prior to that the gauge is noted as moving in 1913, 1917 (five-eighths of a mile south) and 1921. The altitudes are 1500, 1700, 1550 before the final 1540
The gaps in the records are for bracketed readings that have been removed along with the respective annual total
1921 and 1932 totals are bracketed but none of the monthly readings are and the total equals the sum of the monthly readings. Annual totals left in the record
Feb and Mar 1945 are noted as being apportioned and have been removed but the annual total has been left in the record
